metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of intensive rain gauges observations in the arid region hydrology experiment area
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：中游干旱区水文试验区雨量筒加密观测数据集
metadata.description:
The dataset of intensive rain gauges observations was obtained in the arid region hydrology experiment area, in cooperation with dual polarized doppler radar observations. There was no single dataset for the upper stream observations for the poor quality; the middle stream dataset was collected by 29 RG3-M self-recording rain gauges: the northernmost (100.36°E, 39.16°N), the southernmost (100.34°E, 38.61°N), the easternmost (100.62°E, 38.87°N), and the westernmost (100.26°E, 38.82°N). Rain gauges R02-R09 measured from May 18 to Oct. 9, 2008, and R10-R30 from May 26 to Oct. 9, 2008. The technique criterions of these rain gauges were :
     (1) caliber: 165mm×254mm
     (2)  the temperature range:  0°C —+70°C
     (3)  resolution: 0.2mm
     (4)  the measuring range: 0—320cm
     (5)  the measuring accuracy: 1%
metadata.descriptionCn:
为配合双偏振多普勒雷达进行观测，分别在上游寒区水文试验区和中游干旱区水文试验区内布置了多个雨量筒进行加强观测。其中上游的数据由于质量较差，没有列为一个单独的数据集。中游的观测由29个RG3-M型自动采集翻斗式雨量筒组成，其中最北的雨量筒位置为100.36°E；39.16°N，最南端的雨量筒位置为100.34°E；38.61°N，最东端的雨量筒位置为100.62°E；38.87°N，最西端的雨量筒位置为100.26°E；38.82°N。观测时间R02-R09号雨量筒从2008-05-18开始到2008-10-09结束，R10-R30号雨量筒从2008-05-26开始到2008-10-09结束。其主要技术指标如下：
（1）承水口径：165mm×254mm
（2）温度测量范围：0°C —+70°C
（3）分辨率：0.2mm
（4）测量范围：0—320cm
（5）测量精度：1%

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main technical specifications of the RG3-M type automatic tipping bucket rain gauges used in the Heihe River Basin midstream hydrological experiment?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: RG3-M型自动倾斜桶雨量计在黑河流域中游水文实验中的主要技术规格是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Catchment diameter 165mm×254mm temperature measurement range 0°C to +70°C resolution 0.2mm measurement range 0 to 320cm measurement accuracy 1%
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 集水直径165mm×254mm，温度测量范围0°C至+70°C，分辨率0.2mm，测量范围0至320cm，测量精度1%。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key specifications and precision details of the instruments used in hydrological data collection in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区进行水文数据收集所使用仪器的关键规格和精度细节是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: measurement inlet 165mm×254mm, temperature measurement range 0°C to +70°C, resolution 0.2mm, measurement range 0 to 320cm, measurement accuracy 1%
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 测量入口165mm×254mm，温度测量范围0°C至+70°C，分辨率0.2mm，测量范围0至320cm，测量精度1%。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many automatic rain gauge units were used for data collection in the middle reaches arid zone hydrological experiment area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在中游干旱区水文实验区使用了多少个自动雨量计进行数据收集？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors lead to the need for increased density of rain gauge observations in arid region hydrological experiments?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区水文实验中，导致对雨量计观测密度增加需求的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for increased density of rain gauge observations in arid region hydrological experiments arises from the requirement to support observations with dual-polarization Doppler radar and the necessity to accurately capture precipitation patterns in areas with low rainfall and high variability. The deployment of multiple rain gauges helps improve the precision and reliability of rainfall data in these conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区的水文实验中，增加雨量计观测密度的需求源于支持双极化多普勒雷达观测的要求，以及准确捕捉降水模式的必要性，这些地区降水量低且变异性大。部署多个雨量计有助于提高在这些条件下降水数据的精确性和可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures and technologies are used to ensure accurate and precise data collection with rain gauges in arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，确保雨量计数据收集准确和精确的程序和技术包括哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field, 29 RG3-M type automatic tipping bucket rain gauges are used for data collection in an arid region hydrological test area. The technological specifications include a water inlet diameter of 165mm×254mm, a temperature measurement range of 0°C to +70°C, a resolution of 0.2mm, a measurement range of 0—320cm, and a measurement accuracy of 1%. The rain gauges are strategically placed across the test area, with specific geographical coordinates marking the northernmost, southernmost, easternmost, and westernmost locations. These gauges were operational from May to October 2008, ensuring data collection over different seasonal conditions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在该领域，使用了29个RG3-M型自动倾斜桶雨量计进行数据收集，地点位于一个干旱地区的水文测试区。技术规格包括水入口直径为165mm×254mm，温度测量范围为0°C至+70°C，分辨率为0.2mm，测量范围为0—320cm，测量精度为1%。这些雨量计在测试区内战略性地布置，具体地理坐标标记了最北、最南、最东和最西的位置。这些雨量计从2008年5月到10月投入使用，确保在不同季节条件下进行数据收集。
